attributes.action: Empower the Next Generation by Teaching Key Life Skills in Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Key life skills include self-help, the helping of others, conflict management and parenting.  Other prerequisite life skills include listening, empathy, assertiveness and empowerment.  A healthy society depands on most citizens having these skills and so the teaching of these skills in schools must be treated as a top priority.  And as these skills are best taught by example, parents and teachers must have these skills too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
